caption.p: Determinants of Yellow Fever live attenuated vaccine immunity. Schematic diagram illustrating different elements of the YF vaccine (dosage, vaccine strain, vaccine handling, i.e., cold chain), environment (endemic vs non-endemic regions, co-infection, heterologous flavivirus exposure) and host (age, genetics, microbiome) that could influence host immune response outcome to YF vaccination. Created with BioRender.com.
